answers: Ans. Hematite ore is the most important industrial iron ore in terms of the quantity used.

questions: Q. 2. How did the Bailadila iron-ore field get its name ?
answers: Ans. The Bailadila hills look like the hump of an ox, hence Bailadila iron-ore field get its name.

questions: Q. 3. How is iron–ore transported from Kudremukh mines to a port near Mangaluru ?  1 mark each
answers: Ans. Iron-ore is transported as slurry through pipelines.

questions: Q. 4. Why is copper mainly used in electrical cables and electronic industries ?
answers: Ans. It is used in electrical cables as it is malleable, ductile and a good conductor of heat and electricity.

questions: Q. 5. Why aluminium metal has great importance ? [Board Term–II, Outside Delhi Set–III Set–III,, 2016]
answers: Ans. It has great importance because it combines the strength of metals such as iron with extreme lightness and also with good conductivity and great malleability.
